REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F A f0217 reute u f BC-SUMITOMO-BANK-<SUMI> 03-11 0052

TEXT.TITLE: SUMITOMO BANK <SUMI> DECLARES STOCK DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Sumitomo Bank of California said it declared a 7-1/2 pct stock dividend in addition to its regular quarterly cash dividend of 29 cts per share. Both dividends are payable April 27 to shareholders of record March 31, the company said. Reuter
